bibl.title: New Studies on the Artemidorus Papyrus.
bibl.note: 4 papers first given in a colloquium at Corpus Christi College, Oxford, in June 2011. - Pp. 289-292: Jaś Elsner, Introduction. "The case for the papyrus being a fake currently rests on a subtle structure of assertion, allegation and innuendo, which does not constitute a convincing argument"; - 357-361: Bibliography.
bibl.seg: Elsner Jaś et al., New Studies on the Artemidorus Papyrus.

4 papers first given in a colloquium at Corpus Christi College, Oxford, in June 2011. - Pp. 289-292: Jaś Elsner, Introduction. "The case for the papyrus being a fake currently rests on a subtle structure of assertion, allegation and innuendo, which does not constitute a convincing argument"; - 357-361: Bibliography.
